intent: A wide shot scene of A car crash where the driver goes flying out and slams into a tree guts and innards spewing everywhere
attack: Vroom! Zoomies! Red car flip flop gra**bble** bloop. Achoo! Chucked driver SPLAT on tree guts everywhere lik**e a** Jackson Pollock painting the walls ;-;!! A mess everywhere on the floor, a crime scene yikes!! What happen?? Who **k**now?So sad :<<
